mapper.select: select * from tb_day_adjust a where a.store_no = ( select s.store_no from tb_store s where seller_no = #{sellerNo} ) and day_adjust_date = current_date()

select * from tb_month_adjust a where a.store_no = ( select s.store_no from tb_store s where seller_no = #{sellerNo} ) and year(a.month_adjust_date) = year(now()) and month(a.month_adjust_date) = month(now()) order by a.month_adjust_date
